featured.text: Google, which already uses prototypes of such cars to ferry its staff along Californian freeways, once put a blind man in a prototype and filmed him being driven off to buy takeaway hamburgers.
The sandals have subsequently undergone redesign, often appearing in bright colors in line with Californian beach culture.

definition.zh_def: 加利福尼亞州的，或與加利福尼亞州有關的。
definition.en_def: Relating to or characteristic of California or its inhabitants.
definition.example: She moved to California to experience the Californian lifestyle.
